msItem.title: Ma'athir-i Sultaniyyah.
msItem.note: Folio one, recto: Presented by Col. Monthieth Dec. 4 1830 A history of the Qajars from their origin to AH 1229. The first part. Codrington/Reade No 151 (b) contains the second part. Some headings in red. On cream-coloured watermarked European paper.
msItem.incipit: Sipas u sitayish-i farawan az khakiyyan

bindingDesc.p: Codrington and Codrington/Reade No 151 covers two volumes numbered 151 and 152 in Morley's printed catalogue, and does not clearly distinguish them. Here they are given separate entries as Codrington/Reade Nos 151 (1) and 151 (2). Handwritten notes on the Library copy of Codrington refer to this. Both volumes are in uniform format and bindings and written by the same scribe. Dark brown leather binding with blind-tooling and coloured stamped panels.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
